name: vesta-workspaces-app
description: An AI-powered collaborative platform for analyzing project plans.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html metadata.json dist/ && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.API_KEY='"'$API_KEY'"' --external:@google/genai --external:jspdf --external:pdfjs-dist --external:mammoth
